metadata.Title: CVE-2022-35230 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: An authenticated user can create a link with reflected Javascript code inside it for the graphs page and send it to other users. The payload can be executed only with a known CSRF token value of the victim, which is changed periodically and is difficult to predict.

criterions.comment: zabbix package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
